I downloaded and installed this torrent about one week ago on my Windows 7 Ultimate PC.  I followed the instructions, installed Office 2007 Professional only, everything worked great and I used the heck out of Outlook, Excel and Word for a week.  However, today, Office has stopped working:  in Outlook, the "new", "forward", and "reply" buttons are all permanently grayed out throughout the software making it impossible to create any new emails (although it still downloads email fine).  In Excel, the "new" and "save" buttons are grayed out, making it unusable, although I can still open and edit documents.  So long story short, the software figured out that it's not legit, and basically disabled itself.  It was nice while it lasted though!

Everything works just fine!

for those who get the "access denied" in saving the .XML file, I tried messing around with the Properties of that .XML file.. 

Security> Edit 
and I checked the 'Full Control' under the Allow checkboxes.. 

I hope this helped.
